example.parse: (CONJ و) (S (VP (PRT (VERB_PART قد)) (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:2MP أشرتم) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PP (PREP الى) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الوضع)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الاقتصادي) (CONJ و) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN السياسي)))) (CONJ و) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN وضع) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المهندس) (NOUN_PROP عيراني))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: to the political and economic situation and to the situation of the engineer Irani

example.arg: الى الوضع الاقتصادي و السياسي و الى وضع المهندس عيراني .
